content: Which iconic American singer, known as the "King of Rock and Roll", released a self-titled debut album in 1956 featuring hits like "Blue Suede Shoes"?

I believe you're referring to Elvis Presley. He was indeed known as the "King of Rock and Roll," and his self-titled debut album was released in 1956, which included the hit song "Blue Suede Shoes." This album marked the beginning of his prolific career in music. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about Elvis or that album?
